name: Base Edition
info: The minimalist ObsidianOS Edition, comes with a TUI installer.

name: KDE Edition
info: Experience ObsidianOS with KDE Plasma desktop environment! Recommended

name: COSMIC Edition
info: Try out ObsidianOS with System76's COSMIC desktop! No software rendering support! COSMIC is still in beta.

name: Void Edition
info: Try out ObsidianOS based on Void! <b>Undocumented, not reccomended for beginners, does not have a builtin sfs.
